name: This and That
description:
Find out what mixes with what

Click an icon from your inventory to add it to the equation.
Click an item in the equation to remove it.

Made for TriJam #94
Theme: a + b = c

SPOILERS

All possible combinations below:

(You've been warned)

  1. Rock + Rock
  2. Water + Water
  3. Rock + Water
  4. Fire + Fire
  5. Fire + Water
  6. Fire + Rock
  7. Air + Rock
  8. Lava + Sea
  9. Fire + Planet
  10. Energy + Planet
  11. Life + Rock
  12. Dust + Water
  13. Energy + Rock
  14. Clay + Life
  15. Plant + Water
  16. Rock + Tree
  17. Tool + Tree
  18. Ink + Paper
  19. Book + Human
  20. Sun + Wisdom
  21. Human + Priest
  22. Cultist + Tool
  23. Cultist + Wisdom
  24. Tool + Wisdom
  25. Electricity + Scientist
  26. Human + Processor
  27. Barbarian + Wizard
  28. Cyborg + Cyborg
  29. Army + Megabot
  30. Death + Life

That's all folks!
